color-scheme.js

Generate nice, pretty color schemes with JavaScript.

Example

scm = new ColorScheme;
scm.from_hue(21)
   .scheme('triade')
   .distance(0.1)
   .add_complement(false)
   .variation('pastel')
   .web_safe(true);
   
var colors = scm.colors();

console.log(colors);

# [ 'ff9966', '996633', 'ffcccc', 'cc6633', '669966', '339966', 'ccffcc', '33cc99', '339999', '339966', 'ccffcc', '33cc99' ]
